00015 package citation.data;
00016 
00017 import net.rim.device.api.util.Persistable;
00018 
00019 
00027 public class Citation implements Persistable {
00028         
00029     public int Number;
00030     public CLocation Loc;
00031     public CPerson Person;
00032     public CVehicle Vehicle;
00033     public CViolation Violation;
00034     // status flags
00035     private boolean readonly;
00036     private boolean submitted;
00037     
00038     public Citation () {
00039         Person = new CPerson();
00040         Vehicle = new CVehicle();
00041         Loc = new CLocation();
00042         Violation = new CViolation();
00043         
00044         setReadOnly(false);
00045         setSubmitted(false);
00046     }
00047  
00055         public void setReadOnly(boolean readonly) {
00056                 this.readonly = readonly;
00057                 
00058                 Loc.setReadOnly(readonly);
00059                 Person.setReadOnly(readonly);
00060                 Vehicle.setReadOnly(readonly);
00061                 Violation.setReadOnly(readonly);
00062         }
00063 
00064         public boolean isReadOnly() {
00065                 return readonly;
00066         }
00067 
00075         public void setSubmitted(boolean submitted) {
00076                 this.submitted = submitted;
00077         }
00078 
00079         public boolean isSubmitted() {
00080                 return submitted;
00081         }
00082 
00083         
00087         public String toPrettyString()
00088     {
00089         return "Citation: \n" + "Personal Information: \n"+ Person.toPrettyString() + "\n"+
00090                 "Vehicle Information: \n" + Vehicle.toPrettyString() +  "\n"+
00091                 "Location of Incedent: \n" + Loc.toPrettyString() +  "\n"+
00092                 "Violation Information: \n" + Violation.toPrettyString() + "\n";
00093     }
00094         
00098     public String toXMLString()
00099     {
00100         String header= "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\" ?>" + "\n";
00101         
00102         String citeXML= 
00103                 "<Citation>" + 
00104                         Person.toXMLString()  + Vehicle.toXMLString() +Loc.toXMLString() + Violation.toXMLString() +
00105                 "</Citation>";
00106         
00107         return header + citeXML ;
00108     }
00109 
00110     
00111 }
